doc.title: Epic Breakdown
doc.snippet: As a developer, I want to have a bootstrapped Next.js application with all the necessary dependencies, so that I can start building the frontend.

doc.title: Architecture Specification
doc.snippet: The frontend is the primary user interface for the platform. Framework: Next.js (with React), Styling: Tailwind CSS, Deployment: Vercel.

doc.title: Epic Technical Specification: Foundation & Core Application
doc.snippet: This epic focuses on establishing the essential technical infrastructure and implementing the foundational functionalities of the AI CV & Job Application Assistant.

doc.title: Product Requirements Document
doc.snippet: Establish the project's technical foundation and deliver the core functionality of CV parsing and job ad analysis.

doc.title: UX Design Specification
doc.snippet: System: shadcn/ui (v0.8.0). Rationale: The user chose shadcn/ui for its balance of speed, aesthetics, and customization, especially given the project's use of Tailwind CSS.
